solution_line_template: Gus eats {breakfast_eggs} + {lunch_eggs} = <<{breakfast_eggs}+{lunch_eggs}={eggs_breakfast_lunch}>>{eggs_breakfast_lunch} eggs for breakfast and lunch.
Including dinner, he eats a total of {eggs_breakfast_lunch} + {dinner_eggs} = <<{eggs_breakfast_lunch}+{dinner_eggs}={total_eggs}>>{total_eggs} eggs.
